headline: Will a New General Counsel Influence Everest Group's (EG) Strategic Direction and Governance Approach?
summary: Everest Group, Ltd. recently announced that Anthony Vidovich has been appointed as Executive Vice President and General Counsel, succeeding Ricardo Anzaldua, who will retire following a transition period to ensure a seamless handover of responsibilities. This leadership change adds a seasoned legal professional with nearly 30 years of global property and casualty (re)insurance industry experience to the company's executive team, potentially influencing its corporate governance and strategic...
